overview: The House That Jack Built is a 1976 stop-motion film that utilizes a combination of claymation and LEGO animtion. It follows a clay man and his son (plus their dog) building a house using LEGO bricks. It was shared online in 2009 by YouTube user "moospeedtv", and was created by his father. It is one of the very earliest known brickfilms.
title: The House That Jack Built
